name: Growl Notification File
summary: Learn about .GROWLTICKET files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Individual Growl notification files are created for each supported application. For example, "GrowlTunes.growlTicket" is the notification file for iTunes, while "GrowlSafari.growlTicket" is used by Safari.
GrowlTicket files are saved in the user's application support directory located at "~/Library/Application Support/Growl."

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
